title: Androidâ€™s Bluetooth and Ultra-wideband stacks become mainline modules in Android 13
content:
Google just dropped the first Android 13 developer preview, and it gives us a glimpse of some of the changes coming in the next major Android upgrade. As we highlighted in our announcement post, Android 13 DP1 reveals that Google will roll out updated privacy controls, a new Photo picker API, a Quick settings placement

The post Android’s Bluetooth and Ultra-wideband stacks become mainline modules in Android 13 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google will make Android's Bluetooth and Ultra-wideband stacks mainline modules in Android 13. Read on to learn what that means.
